headline: Should Elliott’s Activist Push for Leadership and Board Changes at Norwegian (NCLH) Require Action From Investors?
summary: In February 2026, activist investor Elliott Investment Management, which holds more than a tenth of Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings’ shares, publicly pressed the board for sweeping changes, criticizing a decade of missteps and urging new leadership, fresh directors, and a revised business plan to improve execution and financial performance. Elliott’s willingness to take its campaign directly to shareholders, combined with recent governance and oversight concerns at Norwegian, raises the...

headline: Norwegian Cruise Line (NCLH) Q4 Earnings Report Preview: What To Look For
summary: Cruise company Norwegian Cruise Line (NYSE:NCLH) will be announcing earnings results this Monday before market hours. Here’s what investors should know.
